sample

类 ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.ScoreBoard

  • public class ScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ScoreBoard represents the permanent high score list appears at the end of each round.

    Provided by BufferedReader, BufferedWriter, FileReader, FileWriter, IOException, Comparator, PriorityQueue.

    This class controls the generation and visualization of the permanent high score list. The list is generated at the start of the game by file reading. The data structure of the score list is a priority queue. Every time a new record is added, the corresponding file would be updated.

    版本:
    1.03
    作者:
    Boon Giin Lee, Heng Yu, Chen Liao

        private void addRound(Round rd)
        method addRound adds a new round to the current round priority queue.

        method fileWriter updates the file with priority queue after every round

      • addScoreBoard

        public javafx.scene.Group addScoreBoard(javafx.scene.Group root,
                                        Round rd)
        Method addScoreBoard adds a new round to the queue and visualize the high score list on the game board after each round
        参数:
        root - : base javafx element
        rd - : this round
        返回:
        : the updated game board
